abstrac: No money unless you are 100% Satisfy
bio:
We are a team of experts based at Kolkata, Ahmedabad (India) and South Yorkshire (UK). We have a very unique philosophy i.e., No money unless user use the program and the user is 100% satisfied. The reason we work this way is because we always look for a long term relationship and references.

Top 8 reasons to work with us:-
1. Unique philosophy and culture to satisfy clients internationally.
2. Maximum Return on Investment.
3. Low cost and best quality IT services.
4. 25+ highly skilled IT professionals.
5. Flexible engagement models.
6. 100+ clients spread across diverse business verticals.
7. 24/7 support across all timezones.
8. Impressive and innovative IT infrastructure

We provide broad range of software development services to help you harness the power of technology, consulting and maximize your online investment.

bio:
I have worked in the Graphic Arts and Sign Industry for over 20 years.
My ability to guarantee 100% satisfaction with my work comes from a heartfelt belief in the importance of not only listening, but hearing what a customer has to say. I never impose my views based on my years of experience. Rather, I strive for that rare blend of taking a customer's ideas and utilizing my professional skills to achieve the customer's goal. Naturally I will offer suggestions when warranted, but I do not attempt to steer customer decisions in a direction that does not suit their wishes.   I am a firm believer in being readily available for communicating throughout all stages of a project. You will never be left to wonder how your project is progressing. The amount of stress relief due to this simple commitment will amaze you.
Payment terms are negotiable based on your job requirements. I will work with you to ensure a feeling of fairness and safety on behalf of both parties.
